title: Heterocyclic (pyrazine)carboxamide Ru(II) complexes: structural, experimental and theoretical studies of interactions with biomolecules and cytotoxicity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8322-8330
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00525B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nokwanda Tsaulwayo, Reinner O. Omondi, Paranthaman Vijayan, Nicole R. S. Sibuyi, Miché D. Meyer, Mervin Meyer, Stephen O. Ojwach
The heterocyclic (pyrazine)carboxamide Ru(II) complexes interact with CT-DNA through minor groove binding and partial intercalation modes and exhibit significant cytotoxicity and selectivity against A549, PC-3, and Caco-2 cell lines.
